title: Bots in ARAM  OCE
body:
Wow, good to see riot following this rubbish up

https://gyazo.com/5e6e080532aadb399a28e695eb766850

replies.body: after 1am, and especially after 3am AEST you'll find a lot of bots. They are a lot less frequent than they were even 2 months ago and I like to think my lists sent to riot support :D I love finding bots HAHAHAHA

Just came out of an ARAM with 9 other bots.  The only time I carried anything as ADC ever.

Reported the lot of them.

you also find a lot of them in bots but youll get used to it
(as in bots i mean bots on your team)
